About Us

Who are we

Thrive Workplace Benefits is located in Orange County, servicing clients both here in Southern California and nationally with a concierge approach.

We take your business personally, representing you - not a product. The world of employee benefits is ever-changing, complicated, and often intimidating. But it doesn’t need to be. We take pride in our honest, straightforward approach to benefits consultation, making sure you the client are prepared to make the right choices to meet your goals.

To us, you are more than a client, you are family.

Erica Sylvia
President / CEO

Beverly Evans
Chief Benefits Coordinator

With over 20 years experience as a Premier agent specializing in competitive benefits across all carriers, I am your constant support for the implementation and administration of customized benefit programs. Empathy and service is my trademark approach to your employees needs. A longtime resident of Orange County, I enjoy time spent hiking and biking in the Back Bay and racing sailboats in both the Newport Harbor and open ocean. I am an avid animal lover with two frisky dogs, a tortoise, a bunny, and two guinea pigs.
